Title: Uncovering Clues
Text: I need to gather information about the stolen UNU Mastodon Coupe by visiting "the fabric", a renowned establishment nestled atop Golem Street in Citrus Alley. The venue boasts a commanding view of the district and attracts a diverse crowd. To reach "the fabric", I should head south from the Gramados Civic Center and follow Golem Street up the hill. Once at the end of the street, the venue will be on my left.
CompleteText: I am now at "the fabric", I need to find a waiter.
